name: LOGOS Public Affairs
membership: Member of EPACA (European Public Affairs Consultancies' Association), BRITCHAM (British Chamber of Commerce), AMCHAM Belgium
goal:
LOGOS Public Affairs provides high quality public affairs advice and services. We advise clients on strategic issues, issue management, association management, communication and consensus building. For the part of our activity which corresponds to the Commission's definition of lobbying, we see our role as enablers of a dialogue between those who define the rules, and those to whom they are adressed.
LOGOS Public Affairs is part of the MCI Group, a a globally integrated association, communication and event management company.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Budget, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Sport, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Energy package, Circular economy, NRMM, Euro 5 and 6, ETS,   Anti money laundering Directive, E-Privacy Regulation, AVMS Directive, Copyright Directive, Telecoms Review, Review of Batteries Directive, non ETS, New Emissions Ceiling Directive, Revision of EASA
